text:
Hello,
is there some simple way of just increasing the resolution of a `png` image when created with the `pgfplotsx()` backend? `dpi` does not seem to work and if I increase `size` then I get tiny labels, etc.

text: aah, maybe `Plots.scalefontsizes()` could come to the rescue!
There is a dpi option in PGFPlotxX at least, maybe the option from Plots is not passed to it? Or it doesn't work correctly..

text: It seems pretty dead to me right now but I'm stuck in a slightly old env that breaks when I update it so I don't know if it has already been fixed.
